name: Tap Ludum - Tap RPG
description:
Tap Ludum is a simple Tap Rpg that you can play both offline and online(to get gems by watching videos).

The objective of this game is to get as strong as you can to beat your enemies and keep going.

Notice: The Save and Load is manual, remember this when you are playing.

In this game you have Level, Life Points, Attack Power, Experience(when it reaches a certain point you level up and gain skills and will get stronger), Gold(Used to buy things in the game), Gems(To upgrade more fast your skills).

You can use Skill Points to get more stronger in the game, you can buy potion with gold to heal yourself when your life is low.

Trainning Dummie is good to upgrade your skills, you can get Training Stones and use them to get more Stronger to beat the enemies and the Boss.

Reset System To reset Monster Level or Player Level.

This game does not contain paid content, you can watch videos to get gems to speed up your progress in the game.

This game will have an update per week to add new content, balances, improvements and other things.

Oficial Site: https://tapludum.blogspot.com/
